metadata.title: CVE-2021-29943 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: When using ConfigurableInternodeAuthHadoopPlugin for authentication, ApacheSolr versions prior to 8.8.2 would forward/proxy distributed requests usingserver credentials instead of original client credentials. This wouldresult in incorrect authorization resolution on the receiving hosts.

criterions.comment: lucene-solr package in trusty is affected and needs fixing.
